Title: Relates to conducting hearings of a grand jury proceeding during a state disaster emergency
Summary: Authorizes electronic appearances before a grand jury proceeding in the event of a state disaster emergency, declared in accordance with article two-B of the executive law.
LawCode: Add ยง190.95, amd ยง190.80, CP L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law, in relation to conducting hearings of a grand jury proceeding during a state disaster emergency; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
